    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JDBConnection(java.lang.String host, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String pass, java.lang.String database)
      Constructs a new JDBCConnection to the specified database on a specified host.

      • update

        public boolean update(java.lang.String table,
                      java.lang.String[] columns,
                      java.lang.String[] newValues,
                      java.lang.String whereClause)
        Completes an UPDATE command on the table according to the provided parameters and returns true if the command was successfully executed and false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        table - - The table to apply the command to.
        columns - - The columns which are having values changed.
        newValues - - The new value to be stored in the matching column.
        whereClause - - The boolean clause at the end of the statement or null if you wish
        Returns:
        Whether the command completed successfully or not.

      • insert

        public boolean insert(java.lang.String table,
                      java.lang.String[] columns,
                      java.lang.String[] values)
        Completes an INSERT command on the table according to the provided parameters and returns true if the command was successfully executed and false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        table - - The table to apply the command to.
        columns - - The columns to be inserted into.
        values - - The values to be inserted into the corresponding column.
        Returns:
        Whether the command completed successfully or not.

        Returns:
